channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree location tarmaced over, 21st October
item.description:
The location of the mature cheery tree which was recently been felled has been tarmaced over rather than being replaced. This is not in keeping with the rest of the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cleeve View Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on bypass, 21st October
item.description:
A collection of items put together for easy collection on the bypass from Glos Biz Park to Zoons Court roundabout just past Hucclecote Rugby Club on the left on the grass verge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 20th October
item.description:
Blocked or damaged drain The drain can no longer be seen as grass has grown over it. Every time it rains a huge area is covered with water making the drivers swerve and pedestrians are unable to pass safely on the pavement or get a tidal wave of water over them if cars don’t take care. It’s a reoccurring as design is poor. The drain is blocked
Report on FixMyStreet
